verses.verse: SHa'ul <WG3972>, an emissary <WG652>, (not <WG3756> of <WG575> men <WG444>, neither <WG3761> by <WG1223> man <WG444>, but <WG235> by <WG1223> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, and <WG2532> 'Elohim <WG2316> the Father <WG3962>, who <WG3588> raised <WG1453> <WG5660> him <WG846> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>;)
And <WG2532> all <WG3956> the brethren <WG80> which are with <WG4862> me <WG1698>, unto the Congregations <WG1577> of Galatia <WG1053>:
Grace <WG5485> be to you <WG5213> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> from <WG575> 'Elohim <WG2316> the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> from our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>,

Who <WG3588> gave <WG1325> <WG5631> himself <WG1438> for <WG5228> our <WG2257> sins <WG266>, that <WG3704> he might deliver <WG1807> <WG5643> us <WG2248> from <WG1537> this present <WG1764> <WG5761> evil <WG4190> world <WG165>, according <WG2596> to the will <WG2307> of 'Elohim <WG2316> and <WG2532> our <WG2257> Father <WG3962>:
To whom <WG3739> be glory <WG1391> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.

I marvel <WG2296> <WG5719> that <WG3754> ye are <WG3346> so <WG3779> soon <WG5030> removed <WG3346> <WG5727> from <WG575> him that called <WG2564> <WG5660> you <WG5209> into <WG1722> the grace <WG5485> of Moshiach <WG5547> unto <WG1519> another <WG2087> gospel <WG2098>:

Which <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> another <WG243>; but there be <WG1526> <WG5748> some <WG5100> that <WG1508> trouble <WG5015> <WG5723> you <WG5209>, and <WG2532> would <WG2309> <WG5723> pervert <WG3344> <WG5658> the gospel <WG2098> of Moshiach <WG5547>.

But <WG235> though <WG2532> <WG1437> we <WG2249>, or <WG2228> an angel <WG32> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, preach any other gospel <WG2097> <WG5735> unto you <WG5213> than <WG3844> that which <WG3739> we have preached <WG2097> <WG5668> unto you <WG5213>, let him be <WG2077> <WG5749> accursed <WG331>.

As <WG5613> we said before <WG4280> <WG5758>, so <WG2532> say I <WG3004> <WG5719> now <WG737> again <WG3825>, If any <WG1536> man preach <WG2097> any other <WG3844> gospel <WG2097> <WG5731> unto you <WG5209> than <WG3844> that <WG3739> ye have received <WG3880> <WG5627>, let him be <WG2077> <WG5749> accursed <WG331>.

For <WG1063> do I <WG3982> now <WG737> persuade <WG3982> <WG5719> men <WG444>, or <WG2228> 'Elohim <WG2316>? or <WG2228> do I seek <WG2212> <WG5719> to please <WG700> <WG5721> men <WG444>? for <WG1063> if <WG1487> I <WG700> yet <WG2089> pleased <WG700> <WG5707> men <WG444>, I should <WG302> not <WG3756> be <WG2252> <WG5713> the servant <WG1401> of Moshiach <WG5547>.

But <WG1161> I certify <WG1107> <WG5719> you <WG5213>, brethren <WG80>, that <WG3754> the gospel <WG2098> which <WG3588> was preached <WG2097> <WG5685> of <WG5259> me <WG1700> is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> after <WG2596> man <WG444>.

For <WG1063> I <WG1473> neither <WG3761> received <WG3880> <WG5627> it <WG846> of <WG3844> man <WG444>, neither <WG3777> was I taught <WG1321> <WG5681> it, but <WG235> by <WG1223> the revelation <WG602> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.

For <WG1063> ye have heard <WG191> <WG5656> of my <WG1699> conduct <WG391> in time past <WG4218> in <WG1722> (traditional) Judaism <WG2454>, how that <WG3754> beyond <WG2596> measure <WG5236> I persecuted <WG1377> <WG5707> the Congregation <WG1577> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> wasted <WG4199> <WG5707> it <WG846>:

And <WG2532> profited <WG4298> <WG5707> in <WG1722> Judaism <WG2454> above <WG5228> many <WG4183> my equals <WG4915> in <WG1722> mine own <WG3450> nation <WG1085>, being <WG5225> <WG5723> more exceedingly <WG4056> zealous <WG2207> of the traditions <WG3862> of my <WG3450> fathers <WG3967>.

But <WG1161> when <WG3753> it pleased <WG2106> <WG5656> 'Elohim <WG2316>, who <WG3588> separated <WG873> <WG5660> me <WG3165> from <WG1537> my <WG3450> mother's <WG3384> womb <WG2836>, and <WG2532> called <WG2564> <WG5660> me by <WG1223> his <WG846> grace <WG5485>,

To reveal <WG601> <WG5658> his <WG846> Son <WG5207> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>, that <WG2443> I might preach <WG2097> <WG5735> him <WG846> among <WG1722> the heathen <WG1484>; immediately <WG2112> I conferred <WG4323> <WG5639> not <WG3756> with flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> blood <WG129>:

Neither <WG3761> went I up <WG424> <WG5627> to <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2414> to <WG4314> them which were emissarys <WG652> before <WG4253> me <WG1700>; but <WG235> I went <WG565> <WG5627> into <WG1519> Arabia <WG688>, and <WG2532> returned <WG5290> <WG5656> again <WG3825> unto <WG1519> Damascus <WG1154>.

Then <WG1899> after <WG3326> three <WG5140> years <WG2094> I went up <WG424> <WG5627> to <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2414> to see <WG2477> <WG5658> Kefa <WG4074>, and <WG2532> abode <WG1961> <WG5656> with <WG4314> him <WG846> fifteen <WG1178> days <WG2250>.
But <WG1161> other <WG2087> of the emissarys <WG652> saw I <WG1492> <WG5627> none <WG3756>, save <WG1508> Ya`akov <WG2385> the YY's <WG2962> brother <WG80>.
Now <WG1161> the things which <WG3739> I write <WG1125> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, before <WG1799> 'Elohim <WG2316>, <WG3754> I lie <WG5574> <WG5736> not <WG3756>.
Afterwards <WG1899> I came <WG2064> <WG5627> into <WG1519> the regions <WG2824> of Syria <WG4947> and <WG2532> Cilicia <WG2791>;
And <WG1161> was <WG2252> <WG5713> unknown <WG50> <WG5746> by face <WG4383> unto the Congregations <WG1577> of Judaea <WG2449> which <WG3588> were in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>:

But <WG1161> they had <WG2258> <WG5713> heard <WG191> <WG5723> only <WG3440>, That <WG3754> he which persecuted <WG1377> <WG5723> us <WG2248> in times past <WG4218> now <WG3568> preacheth <WG2097> <WG5731> the faith <WG4102> which <WG3739> once <WG4218> he destroyed <WG4199> <WG5707>.
And <WG2532> they glorified <WG1392> <WG5707> 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>.
